stories.text: We are opening a new office and will have our network / server gear in a room with a large window facing a customer reception area.  We’re told it’d be nice if the racks looked nice through the glass.  Does anyone sell…decorative server equipment?  Something useless with a bunch of blinky lights?  This is one of the stranger requests we’ve dealt with.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to make a photogenic server room

stories.text: As we are advancing to a much more smaller and powerful microchips, this got me wondering, did we  biomimic microchips?
